title: MUNDO Goes Where He Pleases Club
body: So i have recently come into contact with my good friend lvl 7 mundo and we have thought that there needs to be a haven for our hidden society, Dw i see you, our good friend mundo deserves some love and much wanted attetion so i offer my Club as a start where we can recruit fellow mundo players and create a Club worth fearing when thought of. PLUS i just really want the club next to my name{{champion:36}} For Life

replies.body: I reckon they should make a club called "One Trick Ponies" and you're only allowed in if you play Zed, Yasuo, Katarina, or Teemo.
i think your forgettign the player base that 1 tricks riven and that.???????
Oh sorry, and RIven and SInged
obvs singed like them proxy kings though :/
Add Me on LoL and ill Inv you to the Club soon we will be able to get a name tag going
